## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c6a188821a8fcc9aba3c1c6731edb7d72a5fb18997b43678070ad3234057f807)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'volkswagen-onehub-components-raj' @ 70.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
